Asteroid designations ( Number, Name, Temporary designation): 1154, Astronomia,  1154, 1911 RA, 1927 CB, J11R00A, J27C00B
Observation was done on (UT) (format YYYY-MM-DD-hh): 2010 - 03 - 02 - 14:48
Observation was made by : M. Birlan E-mail; Mirel.Birlan@obspm.fr
At observatory with UAI code: 568
Obsv. comments: 
The spectrum was published in the article: http://adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2018RoAJ...28...33B
The normalization of this spectrum was made for the wavelength: 1.250 microns.
Original name of the file was: Astronomia_curat_NIR.txt
